data.comment: The first-half is under way at Estadio do Bonfim - Setubal kick-off to start the match.
The first-half is under way at Estadio do Bonfim - Setubal kick-off to start the match.
Goal kick for Setubal at Estadio do Bonfim.
Setubal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Setubal in their own half.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Setubal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Setubal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Setubal.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Setubal have a goal kick.
Carlos Vinicius of Benfica gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Setubal goal kick.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Setubal territory.
Throw-in for Setubal in the half of Benfica.
Can Setubal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
Setubal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joao Pinheiro awards Benfica a goal kick.
Setubal have a goal kick.
Nabil Ghilas of Setubal is pulled up for offside.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Benfica throw-in in Setubal's half.
In Setubal Benfica's Pizzi is caught offside.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Benfica.
Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Setubal.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Setubal's half?
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Benfica just outside Setubal's area.
Benfica's Andreas Samaris breaks free at Estadio do Bonfim. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Setubal at Estadio do Bonfim.
Throw-in Setubal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Joao Pinheiro awards Benfica a goal kick.
Setubal's Zequinha gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Setubal.
Free kick Benfica.
Benfica's Andreas Samaris goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Benfica throw-in in Setubal's half.
Joao Pinheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Setubal in their own half.
Setubal to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
Free kick Setubal.
Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
Joao Pinheiro awards Benfica a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Setubal.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Setubal territory.
Joao Pinheiro blows against Setubal's Brian Mansilla for offside.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Setubal throw-in in Benfica's half.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
In Setubal Benfica attack through Pizzi. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Setubal at Estadio do Bonfim.
Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Bonfim.
Setubal have a goal kick.
Setubal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Benfica.
Alex Grimaldo (Benfica) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Setubal in the half of Benfica.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Ball goes out of play for a Setubal goal kick.
Joao Pinheiro blows to end the first-half.
Benfica have kicked-off the second half at Estadio do Bonfim.
Setubal take a 1-0 lead thanks to Carlinhos.
That's a fine assist from Zequinha.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Carlos Vinicius (Benfica) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Setubal at Estadio do Bonfim.
An attacking Benfica player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Jose Semedo (Setubal) gets booked by Joao Pinheiro, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Pizzi equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Setubal close to the penalty box.
Joao Pinheiro awards Benfica a goal kick.
Ball safe as Setubal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Setubal drives forward and Carlinhos gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Setubal.
Brian Mansilla (Setubal) has received a yellow card from Joao Pinheiro.
Chiquinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Benfica.
Carlos Vinicius for Benfica is whistled offside.
Rafa Silva is replacing Chiquinho for Benfica at Estadio do Bonfim.
In Setubal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Setubal.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Setubal's half?
Free kick for Setubal in their own half.
Tomas Tavares is booked for the away team.
Free kick Benfica.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Setubal territory.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Benfica throw-in in Setubal's half.
Throw-in for Setubal at Estadio do Bonfim.
Setubal have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Throw-in Benfica.
Free kick for Setubal in the half of Benfica.
Free kick in a good position for Setubal!
Andreas Samaris (Benfica) has received a first yellow card.
Joao Pinheiro waits before resuming play because Nuno Valente for Setubal is still down.
The away team replace Franco Cervi with Dyego Sousa.
Nuno Valente is back on his feet again.
Pizzi for Benfica gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Setubal have a goal kick.
Benfica make their third substitution with Julian Weigl replacing Andreas Samaris.
Throw-in for Setubal in the half of Benfica.
Joao Pinheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Benfica have been awarded a penalty...
Artur Jorge (Setubal) gets a yellow card.
Pizzi (Benfica) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Ball goes out of play for a Setubal goal kick.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Setubal's half?
Can Setubal capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Rafa Silva (Benfica) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Tiago is replacing Nabil Ghilas for the home team.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Setubal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benfica's Dyego Sousa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Setubal defender.
Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benfica's Alex Grimaldo is on target but unsuccessful.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Benfica drive forward but Pizzi is judged offside.
Tiago for the home team is judged to be offside.
Benfica's Carlos Vinicius has run offside.
Julio Velazquez (Setubal) is making a second substitution, with Mirko Antonucci replacing Brian Mansilla.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Benfica.
Nuno Valente (Setubal) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Setubal in their own half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Setubal in their own half.
Throw-in Setubal.
Julio Velazquez is making the team's third substitution at Estadio do Bonfim with Leandrinho replacing Carlinhos.
In Setubal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Dyego Sousa (Benfica) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Free kick for Setubal in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Benfica capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Setubal's half?
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Goal kick for Setubal at Estadio do Bonfim.
Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Bonfim.
Ball safe as Setubal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joao Pinheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Setubal at Estadio do Bonfim.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Setubal.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
